DOMPointReadOnlyMatrixTransform.summary: The static matrixTransform() method of the interface applies a matrix transform specified as an object to the DOMPointReadOnly object, creating and returning a new DOMPointReadOnly object. Neither the matrix nor the point are altered.

remarks.para: If the matrix passed as a parameter is 2D (the is true) then this is a 2D transformation and the point's z coordinate will be 0 and point's w perspective will be 1. Otherwise this is a 3D transformation.
You can also create a new DOMPoint with a point and matrix with the method.
